review: This device keeps dropping off the WiFi when I am streaming a movie.  I have no trouble with other TVs, that I have, streaming  movies using a different device that is connected to the same WiFi.  I only have problems with this device.  I also downloaded the app on my phone that can be used to control this device and I have a difficult time pairing it.  It works some of the time and other times it does not.  I guess you get what you pay for.
